title: Gmail crashes after I open it (3 second delay) and I can't use it
content: GMail is no longer working.  I open it and it shows me my emails (not updating) and closes in 2 seconds.  I have disabled it and rebooted.  rebooted.  synced and then disabled and enabled and sync again.  nothing works.  this just started at 4pm CST on March 22, 2021.
